metadata.title: USN-3894-1 -- GNOME Keyring vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that GNOME Keyring incorrectly cleared out credentials supplied to the PAM module. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to discover login credentials.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3894-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  gnome-keyring - 3.18.3-0ubuntu2.1 libpam-gnome-keyring - 3.18.3-0ubuntu2.1 libp11-kit-gnome-keyring - 3.18.3-0ubuntu2.1 No subscription required
